home.title:
Welcome to copy
& printshop 't Hartje
home.subTitle: A trusted name in Groningen for over 45 years.
home.introduction:
We are your go-to destination for everything related to copying, printing, and press services.
We also offer a wide range of office supplies and cartridges.

copyPrint.title: Copy & Print
copyPrint.introduction: Fast printing or copying, from letters to reports. Make use of our self-service.

customPrinting.title: Custom Print
customPrinting.introduction: Professional printing for your communication materials and promotional tools.

customClothing.title: Custom Clothing
customClothing.introduction: Personalize your clothing and textiles with unique prints with our printing techniques.

officeSupplies.title: Office Supplies
officeSupplies.introduction: Everything you need to set up and optimize your workspace for efficiency.

pageHeaderContent.title: Clothing Printing
pageHeaderContent.introduction:
We offer various techniques for printing your clothing. We can print and cut on flex material, which is ideal for a logo or text in a single color.

Additionally, we have a DTG machine, which stands for Direct To Garment. This allows us to print directly onto clothing.

header.title: CREATE UNIQUE CLOTHING
header.subTitle: Choose a garment
header.introduction: The pricing table below provides an overview of the costs for various garments, such as shirts, polos, sweaters, and hoodies. Depending on your preference, the print can be done in black and white or in color. The final price depends on the type of garment and the size of the print.

header.title: FLEX OR DIRECT ON CLOTHING
header.subTitle: Choose a printing technique
header.introduction:
Flex material works great for clean, single-color designs like logos and text. Below on the left side are our rates for printing and cutting. Our DTG printer allows us to print directly onto clothing, ideal for detailed and vibrant designs. Below on the right side are the rates for garment printing.

Note: We can only print on colored or black textiles from our own supplier. Unfortunately, you cannot provide your own colored or black textiles, as we cannot guarantee the quality of the print.

header.title: Contour-cut from Flex Vinyl or Full Color on SportFilm

notifications.first: - Would you like a color that we do not have in stock? Then an additional €7.95 order fee will be applied.
notifications.second: - For larger sizes, 3XL-5XL, a surcharge of €2.00 per piece applies.
notifications.third: - Printing on your own clothing is at your own risk.

customPrintPage.overviewTitle: An Overview of Our Printing Services
customPrintPage.overviewIntroduction: Explore our wide range of custom printing options. From business cards and flyers to stickers and large-format printing, we have solutions for every need. Click on a category to learn more and get inspired by the possibilities.

pageHeader.title: Stickers
pageHeader.introduction:
Our stickers are available in various sizes, shapes, and quantities. Small quantities are calculated per A4 sheet, while larger quantities are measured per square meter. This is first calculated by us and discussed with the customer.

Whether you need round, oval, large, or small stickers, you will find the perfect option with us. The stickers are printed on self-adhesive white vinyl.

header.introduction:
You can choose from Glossy White Vinyl, Matte White Vinyl, or Transparent Vinyl, depending on the look you prefer. Glossy vinyl enhances colors and gives a premium finish, while matte vinyl offers a subtle, elegant appearance. Transparent vinyl is ideal if you want the background to remain partially visible.

Note: For stickers with a total surface area larger than A4, the price will be calculated upon request.

header.title: Large-format
header.subTitle: Self-adhesive, UV resistant, gloss, matte or transparent, white vinyl

pageHeader.title: Business Cards
pageHeader.introduction:
For printing business cards, we require a minimum order of 100 pieces. The cards are printed on high-quality 350 gsm or 400 gsm paper, ensuring a sturdy and professional appearance.

The listed prices are based on a single file. Please note that the price for folded business cards will be doubled. Once printed, the cards are carefully cut and packaged in a plastic storage box, ensuring they are delivered in perfect condition.

header.title: DIGITAL PRINT
header.subTitle: 350 gsm paper
header.introduction: This price table pertains to digitally printed business cards on sturdy 350 gsm paper. You can choose between black-and-white or color printing, and opt for single-sided or double-sided printing. This ensures a professional appearance, regardless of your choice for your business cards.

header.title: OFFSET PRINT
header.subTitle: 400 gsm paper
header.introduction: This price table pertains to business cards printed on sturdy 400 gsm paper in color. You can choose between single-sided prints with glossy UV coating or double-sided prints with matte dispersion coating. These finishing options provide a refined look, depending on your preference for a glossy or subtle matte finish.

pageHeader.title: Flyers
pageHeader.introduction:
Here you will find an overview of the costs for printing flyers in A6 and A5 formats, with options for both single-sided and double-sided printing.

Choose from a variety of paper types to achieve the perfect look for your flyers, tailored to your preferences and intended use.

header.title: DIGITAL PRINT
header.subTitle: A6 and A5 formats
header.introduction: This price table pertains to digitally printed flyers in A6 or A5 format. You can choose from three different paper weights: 90 gsm, 150 gsm, or 250 gsm, depending on your preference for paper thickness. The flyers can be printed single-sided or double-sided, allowing you to tailor the layout to your needs. Digital printing ensures sharp and vibrant colors for a professional appearance.

header.title: OFFSET PRINT
header.subTitle: A6 and A5 formats
header.introduction: This pricing example is for A6 or A5 flyers printed on 135g, 170g, or 250g paper. Depending on your preference for paper weight, you can choose the option that best suits the desired look of your flyer. The flyers will be printed double-sided, this offers a professional appearance, ideal for both promotional and informational purposes.

pageHeader.title: Folders
pageHeader.introduction:
Here you will find an overview of the costs for printing brochures in A3 and A4 formats. You can choose between a 2-fold or 3-fold option, depending on the message you wish to convey and the space required for it. The various paper types provide a professional look that aligns with the purpose of your brochure.

Prices are clearly listed per paper type and quantity, enabling you to quickly make a decision that suits your needs and budget.

header.title: DIGITAL PRINT
header.subTitle: A4 Format
header.introduction: This overview is for digitally printed A4 brochures, available in color on 150 gsm, 170 gsm, or 250 gsm paper, or black and white on 80 gsm paper. You can choose between a 2 or 3-fold format, depending on the amount of information you wish to present. This size is perfect for distributing detailed information or promotions. The material offers a professional appearance, and the various paper options give you the flexibility to choose the right look for your message.

header.title: A4 format - Bifold or Trifold
header.subTitle: Black and White - 80 gsm White or colored paper

header.title: OFFSET PRINT
header.subTitle: A4 and A3 Format
header.introduction: This overview is for A4 folders in 2- or 3-fold format, or A3 folders in 3-fold format. The folders are printed in color on 135 gsm, 170 gsm, or 250 gsm paper. This makes them ideal for presenting detailed information or promotions in a professional manner. With the different paper weights available, you can choose the right look that fits your message.

pageHeader.title: Posters
pageHeader.introduction:
Explore the available options for printing posters, where you can choose from various formats and paper types. These options allow you to tailor the presentation of your poster to achieve the desired result. From detailed black-and-white prints to vibrant color displays, we offer a range of possibilities that meet the specific requirements of your project.

Refer to the options below for an overview of the available combinations.

header.title: Color or Black and White
header.subTitle: 80 gsm paper
header.introduction: We offer posters on 80 gsm paper, available in both color and black and white. This paper is ideal for printing posters that require a lightweight yet high-quality result for both indoor and outdoor use.

header.title: Color
header.subTitle: 160 to 260 gsm paper
header.introduction: Additionally, we offer other types of paper, including 160 gsm matte, 160 gsm satin, 190 gsm glossy, and 260 gsm satin paper. All of these options are available for color printing and provide a professional finish, suitable for a variety of applications where both durability and visual impact are important. Each type of paper offers specific qualities for optimal presentation of your design, depending on the desired appearance and intended use.

header.title: Color
header.subTitle: Special materials
header.introduction: For our posters in special materials, we offer polypropylene and 260 gsm laid paper. These materials are available for color prints and offer unique properties that make them suitable for specific applications where durability and a distinctive appearance are important. Polypropylene is water-resistant and very sturdy, making it ideal for outdoor use or environments where the poster needs to stay up for a long time. The laid paper provides a natural, handmade appearance, making it suitable for luxury or artistic projects.

header.title: Color
header.subTitle: A3 Format
header.introduction: For A3 posters, we offer two options in different qualities and materials. The high-quality option is printed on 150 gsm paper with bleed, ideal for a premium finish. Additionally, we provide a budget-friendly option printed on 80 gsm paper with a white border. Both available for full color prints.

header.title: A3 Budget Quality - Full color
header.subTitle: With white border on 80 gsm paper

common.deliveryDisclaimer: Delivery times are always subject to change. No rights can be derived from them. We are not responsible for any delays caused by our in-house printer.

pageHeaderContent.title: Copy and Print
pageHeaderContent.introduction: Easily and quickly take care of your copies and prints using our services. Our self-service printers allow you to print documents directly from a USB stick or download them from your email.
pageHeaderContent.subTitle: Laminating
pageHeaderContent.subText: We also offer binding and laminating services to give your documents a neat and professional finish. Perfect for business purposes, school projects, or personal documents.

header.title: BUDGET
header.subTitle: Color or Black and White
header.introduction: For copying and printing, we offer budget-friendly 80 gsm A4 paper, suitable for both color and black-and-white prints. This paper is ideal for everyday printing and copying needs. The listed prices are based on self-service, allowing you to process your documents quickly and affordably. Please use printers 1 to 3 for this paper.

tableBlackAndWhite.title: A4 Black and White | Printer 1 to 3
tableBlackAndWhite.subTitle: 80 gsm paper

header.title: HIGH QUALITY
header.subTitle: Color or Black and White
header.introduction: For high-quality copies and prints, we offer 90 gsm A4 paper, suitable for both color and black-and-white printing. This paper provides a professional appearance with a sturdier and smoother finish. For the best results, please use printer 4, which is specifically configured for this paper quality.

tableHq.title: A4 Color or Black and White | Printer 4
tableHq.subTitle: 90 gsm paper

notifications.first: Budget prices are based on self-service; submitted orders (via email) are printed exclusively on High Quality printers.
notifications.second: - A3 sized paper is 2x the printing price.
notifications.third: - Double sided prints count as 2 prints.

officeSupplies.title: Office supplies
officeSupplies.introduction:
Efficient work starts with the right office supplies. In our store, you will find a wide range of office essentials, from writing materials and binders to envelopes and labels. Additionally, we offer an large selection of cartridges for various printers, ensuring sharp and clear prints at all times.

Our selection includes products from well-known brands, carefully chosen for their quality and reliability.

PaperWeights.80grLong: With white border on 80 gsm paper

paperFormats.A4ColorOrBlackWhite: A4 Color or Black and White

contactPage.contactIntroduction: Do you have questions about our products or services, or would you like to know more about the associated costs? Please fill out our form, and we will ensure you receive a quote quickly and without any obligation.

term-1.title: 1. Acknowledgment of Our Terms
term-1.termContent:
The following terms apply to every quotation, sale, or work performed by 't Hartje.
The buyer/orderer is deemed to know and accept the general terms and conditions as stipulated below.

term-2.title: 2. Quotations
term-2.termContent:
Our prices and offers are non-binding and without obligation.
All quoted prices include VAT unless otherwise stated.
Our quotations are valid for a maximum period of 14 days from the date of the quotation.

term-3.title: 3. Orders
term-3.termContent:
a) Once an order has been placed, cancellation is only possible with mutual consent.
b) If the order is unilaterally terminated by the customer, the customer must still pay the total amount due.

term-4.title: 4. Payment
term-4.termContent:
Orders placed in our store can be paid for upon pickup. Payments can be made by card or in cash.
Orders placed by us with our in-house printer must be paid for in full in advance.
If the order amount is not paid within the payment term set by us (14 days) and payment remains outstanding
after a reminder from us,we reserve the right to engage a collection agency.
Any additional collection costs will be borne by the customer.

term-5.title: 5. Prices
term-5.termContent: 't Hartje reserves the right to adjust prices due to fluctuating increases in paper and printing costs.

term-6.title: 6. Deliveries
term-6.termContent:
We do our utmost to meet the agreed delivery time.
However, no rights can be derived from this.
For orders placed with our in-house printer, delivery times are always subject to change.

term-7.title: 7. Complaints
term-7.termContent: Do you have a complaint about the delivered item? Then you must report it within 2 working days.

commonSentences.tableCaption: Table showing pricing options with their corresponding prices.
